titleStmt.title: A call to weeping: or A warning touching approaching miseries In a sermon preached on the 20th of March, 1699. At the funeral of Mrs. Elizabeth Westen, late wife of Mr. John Westen, who departed this life on the 17th of the said month, in the 38th year of her age. By Benjamin Keach.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for, and sold by John Marshal at the Bible in Grace-Church-street,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 5 reads: A call to vveeping, or a vvarning touching approaching miseries. Demonstrated in a sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Elizabeth Westen late wife of Mr. John Westen.
Reproduction of the original in the Congregational Library, London.
